snippet.title: Puropu Defense Squad Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2491700/
Puropu Defense Squad is co-op action-tower-defense game where you defend your precious extractor against hordes of wacky humans.
Build dozens of traps, turrets, items and use your hero’s abilities in 1-4 player campaigns, and against other players in unique PvP gamemodes!

Puropu Defense Squad Tower Defense Gameplay Trailer
